Summary: THERE WERE FOUR LIGHTS AT FOUR POINTS IN THE SKY, OVER EACH CAR FACTORY
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Flint
There were no other sightings in Flint on or around July 4th 1968
divs: Sighting Details MY BROTHER AND SISTER AND I HAD CLIMBED UP ON THE ROOF ON A FALL EVENING IN 1968 AND WE NOTICED FOUR RED, BLUE, GREEN, AND YELLOW LIGHTS IN ALL FOUR CORNERS OF THE NIGHT SKY. MY SISTER SAID IT LOOKED LIKE THEY WERE OVER WHERE THE FACTORIES WOULD BE. MY BROTHER AND I WERE KIND OF SCARED. WE WENT DOWN AND TOLD OUR MOTHER. BUT LIKE ALL ADULTS SHE DIDN'T BELIEVE US. THAT WAS THE ONLY TIME SAW THEM. NOW AS AN ADULT I ALWAYS KEEP MY EYES UP. YOU NEVER KNOW WHAT YOU'LL SEE. I KEEP HOPING SOMEDAY TO SEE THEM AGAIN.
